decisions.name: Is_running_user_and_Opp_Owner_match
decisions.label: Is running user and Opp Owner match

Flow.description:
Flow Description: Flow to Reopen a Closed Pre-Approval or Convert the Closed PA to a Bond, launched from Wrap Up Opportunity H2 (main flow that houses entire skeleton of working opps)
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.

formulas.name: Link_Bond
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!bondOppIdVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Bond Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: Link_PreApproval
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!paIdOppVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Pre-Approval Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: outstandingDocsMain
formulas.expression: IF({!mainMissingID} = "ID", "ID"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingPayslip} = "Payslip", "Payslip"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingBankS} = "Bank Statement", "Bank Statement"+ BR(), null)

Flow.interviewLabel: Reopen or Convert Closed PA Subflow {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Reopen or Convert Closed PA Subflow

recordUpdates.name: Update_Task_Call_Outcome_No_Contact_Made_0
recordUpdates.label: Update Task Call Outcome - No Contact Made

fields.name: reopenBlock
fields.fieldText:
{!Get_PA_Opportunity.Name} cannot be re-opened due to the stage and status at close off:


Current Stage: {!Get_PA_Opportunity.StageName}

Current Status: {!Get_PA_Opportunity.Status__c}


Please create a new General Opportunity for this customer.

fields.name: reopenClosedOpp_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Option 1: Reopen {!Get_PA_Opportunity.General_Opportunity__r.Name} with the following stage and status and Convert to a Bond:


New Stage: Bond

New Status: PA Issued - OTP Received


The Pre-Approval Opportunity will be auto closed.


A new Bond Opportunity will be created.


Option 2: Reopen {!Get_PA_Opportunity.Name} with the following stage and status:


New Stage: Working

New Status: Awaiting consent


Would you like to reopen {!Get_PA_Opportunity.Name} with the following stage and status?


Current Stage: {!Get_PA_Opportunity.StageName}

Current Status: {!Get_PA_Opportunity.Status__c}


New Stage: Working

New Status: Awaiting Consent

value.stringValue: Upload OTP - Convert to Bond Opportunity

fields.name: reopenClosedOpp_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Option 1: Reopen {!Get_PA_Opportunity.General_Opportunity__r.Name} with the following stage and status and Convert to a Bond:


New Stage: Bond

New Status: PA Issued - OTP Received


The Pre-Approval Opportunity will be auto closed.


A new Bond Opportunity will be created.


Option 2: Reopen {!Get_PA_Opportunity.Name} with the following stage and status:


New Stage: Working

New Status: Awaiting documents

value.stringValue: Upload OTP - Convert to Bond Opportunity

fields.name: reopenClosedOpp_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Option 1: Reopen {!Get_PA_Opportunity.General_Opportunity__r.Name} with the following stage and status and Convert to a Bond:


  • New Stage: Bond
  • New Status: PA Issued - OTP Received

The Pre-Approval Opportunity will be auto closed.

A new Bond Opportunity will be created.


Option 2: Reopen {!Get_PA_Opportunity.Name} with the following stage and status:


  • New Stage: Nurture
  • New Status: PA Issued - awaiting OTP

value.stringValue: Upload OTP - Convert to Bond Opportunity
